mapper.select: select v.vhcle_no, v.vhcle_vhcty, v.vhcle_psncpa, v.common_code_hipass_asn_at, vr.vhcle_resve_no, vr.vhcle_resve_begin_time, vr.vhcle_resve_end_time, vr.vhcle_no, vr.vhcle_resve_empl_id, (select e.empl_nm from empl e where e.empl_id = vr.vhcle_resve_empl_id) as vhcle_resve_empl_nm, vr.common_code_resve_at from vhcle v full outer join vhcle_resve vr on v.vhcle_no = vr.vhcle_no where trunc(vr.vhcle_resve_begin_time) = trunc(sysdate) order by vr.vhcle_resve_begin_time
